title: Unknown problem with client!?
body: I've been having a recurring problem for the past 2 days now, and it seems to be somewhat random as to when it occurs. When in the middle of games my screen and sound will freeze and stay frozen until i fully shutdown and turn my laptop back on again. At first I thought it was something with my laptop, but i've had no trouble running any other games. I tried running the game as an administrator as that was the only thing I could really find to help. It seemed to be better for a while, but now it's happening again, and more often. I really don't know whats wrong and this hasn't been an issue before. I ran the hextech repair tool which didn't seem to help much. I haven't tried reinstalling yet but I really want that to be a last resort. Is there any way I can fix this problem? Any info would be appreciated <3

replies.body: Thanks so much! I guess this was the problem. I've been having no trouble since then and if it comes back I'll be sure to check in with you. <3

Nevermind, I believe I found a solution to my problem. If you just updated to Windows 10, like I did, I think this might be your problem as well, or just give it a try because it helped me. Good luck man, hope it help : ) http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/il5Qxm2w-if-you-are-still-having-the-bugsplat-bug-after-champ-select-read-this
Hey thanks for the response but still no luck :/ I guess I'll just have to wait till another update can come around and fix this mess.
Yeah, it worked for me for a few games, but after that it just stopped and went back to the problem. Sorry dude, guess we're out of luck for a while.

I'm having your same problem dude. Either my game will crash at random moments, or it'll crash right on the loading screen. I don't really know what to do and I would really like some help on solving this problem as well. My crashing started earlier yesterday. I tried reinstalling but nothing changed, I don't know if it's the patch or some other problem. Thank you for any feedback if possible.
